descendants.content: @metin Why do people think there are only numbers...? And what kind of employer was this "IT" guy who asked for a 5-digit solution, or "something" else? Every coder knows the answer if you have only 4 digits and still use numbers. Come on...😏

descendants.content:
@metin @Gednet @mbt3d sadly, the CO2e footprint per person will be higher on the bus, esp. if it not full. not to mention the awful PM10 and, especially, PM2.5 pollution. the latter is actively deadly.

road traffic contributes 6x air traffic, not to mention noise, terrible town and city centres.

not defending the air industry, but there are much bigger problems elsewhere and whilst that's a nice picture, this one is far worse. there is a virtually permanent AQ warning across the whole of London every day.

ground all planes: 1.9% of global emissions.

ICE vehicles: 12.0%

</rant>

account.note: An autonomous anarcho syndicalist collective of the Borg. I am 3 of several...

descendants.content:
@pavsmith @metin @mbt3d

Well then it's good that I make the trip but once per year. The bus is going via Paris..... its PACKED.

Normally I go by train and ferry, but I was curious what a 16hr long busride feels like.

Thoughts so far: cosy and warm.
